summary: I manage the development team that builds ABC.net.au
points: Worked with product and delivery teams to coordinate maintenance of existing ABC web products.
Helped design a greenfield Node and React application framework for new web products.

summary: I managed multiple teams that built and open-sourced frontend infrastructure.
points: Managed the team that open-sourced Relay, a GraphQL framework that powers Facebook's desktop site and native apps.
Founded a team to improve JavaScript performance on Facebook's web sites.
Initiated regular cross-org meetings to improve communication between infrastructure and product teams.
Recruited, mentored and coached team members.
Ran company-wide monthly tech talks for front end engineers.
Presented at meetups and Web Directions 2016 on JavaScript performance.
Conducted 200 technical interviews, trained new interviewers, and designed interview questions for Facebook's frontend recruiting team.

summary: I built common frontend infrastructure for Facebook and led the frontend development of Graph Search.
points: Contributed to open source and internal infrastructure including React, Relay, and Draft.js.
Tech led the development of Facebook's search input and result pages for the launch of Graph Search.
Collaborated with design, UX, and project management to refine the product vision and user experience of Graph Search.
Rebuilt primary site navigation and profile navigation for launch of Timeline.
Taught front end training sessions and mentored new team members.
Developed an in-house billing system with Jira, Plesk and Zendesk integration.
Built a PHP web app for virtual mobile network that featured customer management, account creation flows and integration with custom billing systems.

summary: Maintained sites for Marie Claire, InStyle, Wedding and Look.
points: Achieved 10x speedup in the company’s picture gallery module by optimising caching and other code improvements.

summary: Developed 221b.sh, an interactive game promoting the film Sherlock Holmes.
points: Redesigned database schema to enable rapid iteration on game rules.
Developed CakePHP to Flash integration via AMF interface.
Implemented user authentication and notifications via Facebook Connect.

summary: Helped ship Symbian Developer site, which supported developers on the world’s most widely used mobile OS.
points: Added authentication to vBulletin and Bugzilla via XML-RPC.
Developed CSS, HTML and PHP for user-facing website.

summary: Prototyped and built the official website for The Beatles.
points: Developed a custom CMS system and database design to support graph-based navigation.
Created JavaScript framework for async page loading and seamless HTML fallback.
Implemented a Flash based music player with 3D cover flow interface.

summary: Maintained and developed FileFactory, an Alexa top 500 website.
points: Maintained and relaunched main FileFactory front end.
Developed Facebook application for photo, audio, and file sharing.
Designed and shipped slideshow sharing site with Flash-based editor.
Created drag and drop file manager using jQuery and AJAX.
Created .NET application which handled 50% of uploads to the site.

summary: Lead developer of social networking site Babbello.
points: Recruited and led local and remote development teams.
Designed custom MVC framework using PHP, MySQL and Memcached.
Integrated third-party avatar chat room, webmail and an IM client.
Launched features including profiles, photo albums, blogging, friend feed, forums, post via SMS, micropayments, ads delivery, Flash games arcade.

summary: Maintained multiple websites for mobile content (ringtone) brands.
points: Shipped updated designs to multiple content sites.
Grew loyalty club to 50,000 active members.
Designed, sent and tracked interaction with monthly email newsletters.

summary: Built Stanwell Energy’s Stanwell Community website and CMS.
points: Developed a proprietary CMS using PHP and MySQL.
Helped build Flash and HTML frontends.
